Jokowi Tak Terbitkan Perppu KPK Gegara Uji Materi MK, Mahfud Beri Penjelasan
05 Nov 2019, 16:29 by Rolando Fransiscus Sihombing
Jakarta - Presiden Joko Widodo (Jokowi) tak kunjung menerbitkan Perppu KPK karena judicial review (JR) atau uji materi UU KPK baru di Mahkamah Konstitusi (MK) masih berlangsung. Menko Polhukam Mahfud Md pun memberi penjelasan tentang sikap Jokowi tersebut.
"Jadi gini, sejak sebelum pembentukan kabinet, kita sudah menyampaikan ke Presiden pendapat tentang perlunya perppu ya, dan kita mengatakan ada tiga alternatif, legislative review, JR (judicial review), dan perppu," kata Mahfud di kantornya, Jalan Medan Merdeka Barat, Jakarta Pusat, Selasa (5/11/2019).
Mahfud mengatakan tetap mendukung penerbitan Perppu UU KPK. Namun, menurut Mahfud, saat ini Jokowi memutuskan belum perlu menerbitkan perppu karena ada JR di MK.
"Kita mendukung perppu, tapi kan ada juga kelompok lain yang menyatakan tidak perlu perppu ini nggak ada situasi yang darurat, nah semua masukan itu disampaikan ke presiden dan presiden sekarang sudah memutuskan belum diperlukan Perppu karena apa? Karena sudah ada JR," ujar Mahfud.
Mahfud berujar, Jokowi berpendapat bahwa jika sudah ada JR di MK, tidak etis menerbitkan Perppu KPK. Dia pun menegaskan kembali bahwa Jokowi belum memutuskan mengeluarkan Perppu KPK atau tidak.
"Kalau ada JR kok ditimpa dengan perppu, menurut Presiden ya, dan kita harus hargai pendapat Presiden, menurut Presiden ya rasanya kok etika bernegaranya kurang, orang sedang JR lalu kita timpa perppu. Artinya apa? Presiden dan itu belum memutuskan mengeluarkan perppu atau tidak mengeluarkan perppu," ucap Mahfud.
text:
Jokowi Not Issues Perppu on KPK Gegara to Test MK Material, Mahfud Gives Explanation
05 Nov 2019, 16:29 by Rolando Fransiscus Sihombing
Jakarta - President Joko Widodo (Jokowi) has not yet issued the KPPU Perppu because judicial review (JR) or judicial review of the new KPK Law at the Constitutional Court (MK) is still ongoing. The Coordinating Minister for Political, Legal and Security Affairs Mahfud Md also gave an explanation of Jokowi's attitude.
"So, like this, since before the formation of the cabinet, we have conveyed to the President an opinion on the need for a Perppu, and we said there were three alternatives, legislative review, JR (judicial review), and Perppu," Mahfud said in his office, Jalan Medan Merdeka Barat, Central Jakarta, Tuesday (11/5/2019).
Mahfud said that he continued to support the issuance of the KPPU Perppu on Laws. However, according to Mahfud, currently Jokowi decided that it was not necessary to issue a Perppu because there was JR at the MK.
"We support the Perppu, but there are also other groups stating that there is no need for this Perppu to not have an emergency situation, now all the input was submitted to the president and the president has now decided that Perppu is not needed because of what? Because there is JR," said Mahfud.
Mahfud said, Jokowi was of the opinion that if there had been a JR at the Court, it was unethical to issue a Perppu on the KPK. He also reiterated that Jokowi had not yet decided to issue the KPPU Perppu or not.
"If there is a JR, why is it being overwritten by a Perppu, according to the President? Yes, and we must respect the opinion of the President, according to the President, it seems like the ethics of the civilization is lacking, people are under JR, then we override the Perppu. What does it mean? perppu, "said Mahfud.
